game.name: Train Simulator: Green River – Kemmerer Route
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Union Pacific’s busy and scenic crossing of the Green River Basin of western Wyoming comes to Train Simulator Classic with the Green River – Kemmerer Route developed by Milepost Simulations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Union Pacific’s busy and scenic crossing of the Green River Basin of western Wyoming comes to Train Simulator Classic with the Green River – Kemmerer Route developed by Milepost Simulations.
